title: MongoDB 8 Goes Hard on Time-Series Data, Horizontal Scaling
author: Joab Jackson
description: Optimizations have made the database system 32% more performant. Time-series aggregations have boosted performance by 200%, and scalability has been improved by 50%.
cntitle: MongoDB 8 专注于时间序列数据和横向扩展
cndescription: 优化使数据库系统性能提高了 32%。时间序列聚合使性能提高了 200%，可扩展性提高了 50%。
